rules:
Before we dive into this thrilling puzzle hunt, let's lay down some ground rules. Take your time to read them carefully—your game timer hasn't started yet, so there's no rush. 

在我们开始这场激动人心的寻宝游戏之前，先了解一下基本规则。请仔细阅读，因为您的游戏计时器还没有启动，所以不必着急。

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 1/3]
Remember, you must send only one message at a time, or you might confuse the bot and face penalties! Patience is key as the bot carefully considers your answers.

🧑‍🏫 [游戏规则: 1/3]
请记住，每次只能发送一条消息，否则可能会让机器人感到困惑并受到惩罚！耐心是关键，因为机器人会仔细思考您的答案。

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 2/3]
Your game will be timed. Each incorrect answer adds a penalty of 5 minutes to your final timing, so answer carefully! Need help solving a Stage? A hint is available, but at a cost. Please refer to the image below for details.

The timer will be paused during breaks, so you can properly relax 😉

🧑‍🏫 [游戏规则: 2/3]
您的游戏是有计时的。每个错误答案都会为您的最终时间增加5分钟的惩罚，所以请仔细思考再作答！需要帮助破解难题吗？您可以请求暗示，但这会有代价。请参阅下方图片以获取详细信息。

别担心，休息期间计时器会暂停，让您可以好好放松😉

🧑‍🏫 [Rules: 3/3] Lastly, feel free to share your selfies and photos throughout the game. These won't count as answers to any questions, but we'd love to see your journey! Get ready for an epic adventure, brimming with challenges and mysteries, as you hunt for the secrets of this ancient and coveted recipe. Ready to begin? Type 'READY' and your first puzzle will be on its way. Good luck. 🧑‍🏫 [游戏规则: 3/3] 最后，请随意在游戏中分享您的自拍和照片。这些不会被算作问题的答案，但我们很期待看到您的冒险之旅！ 准备好迎接一场充满挑战和谜团的史诗级冒险了吗？在寻找这个古老而令人垂涎的食谱秘密的过程中，做好准备吧。 准备好了吗？输入“准备好了”，您的第一个谜题将被发送。祝您好运！

text: Stage 1: The following riddle will guide you to where you seek. "In the garden of stones, where virtues align, Children’s play turns to deeds divine. A blossom of purity, though not of the earth, In this sacred act, you'll find its worth. What am I?" Count the number of UNDERLINED words in the riddle. Skip that many words on the English Information Panel to find the ingredient. 谜题 1: 以下谜语将引导您找到您要寻找的地方。 "石头园中美德成行， 孩童玩耍转为善行。 非土之花却至纯净， 在此神圣之举中，找寻其价值。 我是什么？" 数一数谜语中有下划线和斜体的字，然后在英文的信息板中跳过刚刚数的词语，找到您要寻找的食材。
